## Our Objectives

::::: {.columns}
:::: {.column style="width: 47.5%; font-size: 0.8em;"}
[2nd Semester 2024]{.brand-brown .bold}

**Introduce** modeling concepts, ABMs, NetLogo, and the ODD Protocol ([Part I]{.brand-red .bold})

::: {style="padding-top: 15px;"}
[1st Semester 2025]{.brand-brown .bold}

Explore the entire **ODD Protocol**, enabling participants to **create** and structure their own ABMs<br>([Part II]{.brand-red .bold})
:::
::::
:::: {.column style="width: 5%;"}
::::
:::: {.column style="width: 47.5%; font-size: 0.8em;"}
[2nd semester 2025]{.brand-brown .bold}

Learn how to parameterize, calibrate, and **analyze** ABMs effectively ([Parts III & IV]{.brand-red .bold})

::: {style="padding-top: 15px;"}
[1st Semester 2026]{.brand-brown .bold}
:::
